column1: Last week on @cspanwj I discussed the 2020 elections the federal government's #COVID19 response and what it's like to be the only union electrician in the halls of Congress.    https://t.co/AcMo6W8Fzb

In August I wrote an article in support of @JoeBiden's "Build Back Better" plan.   Now the President-elect has an opportunity to implement his vision to bring the economy back from a post #Coronavirus America. #TeamJoe  https://t.co/oI969s7itL

Momentarily President-elect @JoeBiden will speak about the Biden Harris administration's approach to rebuilding and advancing the American economy with an emphasis of defeating the coronavirus as well as strengthening and supporting labor unions. #TeamJoe  https://t.co/47hydzTEUs
According to the @CDCgov wearing a mask not only protects others but protects the wearer from contracting #coronavirus.   It's simple. Wear a mask and stop the spread.   https://t.co/nFhiqbDYa4

Congratulations to my friend President-elect @JoeBiden & Vice President-elect @KamalaHarris!   I look forward to working with President-elect Biden to raise wages protect organizing rights rebuilding our economy and defeating the #coronavirus once and for all  #BidenHarris2020 https://t.co/uoobOLbfJn

It's a great honor to serve the people of South Jersey!  As our nation battles #covid19 we must recommit ourselves to work for the people who deserve greater representation in Washington and a fighting chance at the American dream. https://t.co/HOmdFXnWa1

For the first time in decades this #election did not begin with a huge rally w/ all my union brothers & sisters. Despite the change today we stand together socially distant to elect @JoeBiden and pro-labor Democrats up and down the ballot!   #Election2020 #VOTE https://t.co/yOFBcNu27t

#COVID19 cases are rising rapidly throughout our region leading to  a significant rise is hospitalizations. The virus will not go away unless we continue to practice strict health and safety precautionary measures. #WearAMask   https://t.co/ibw3H4oM4L

This #Halloween comes with a few more guidelines and safety precautions than previous years past. Check out the @NJDeptofHealth's recommendations for having a safe and #Covid free Halloween!  #HappyHalloween   https://t.co/THsI6iiund https://t.co/yCYgqEDyeU

As we continue to battle the #coronavirus pandemic countless New Jerseyans continue heading to work each day. These workers are keeping our economy going and they need the proper protocols and protections to address #COVID19 in the workplace.  https://t.co/9E2yQQEqmh

Everyone deserves a safe affordable place to call home especially now as we continue to fight the coronavirus pandemic.  Affordable housing provides South Jersey families including many seniors and veterans with a safe and affordable place to live.  https://t.co/HcE9um2pSX

As America faces the health and economic crises brought on by the coronavirus pandemic this federal funding will help our neighbors who are also struggling with #addiction as well as those impacted by sexual assault.  https://t.co/EAJCfaNLxi

Now more than ever our #Healthcare workers deserve strong representation in the Washington as well as a strong labor union at home.   I am honored to be endorsed by @JNESODC1 and fight for the rights of the workers on the frontlines of the #Coronavirus battle. https://t.co/Efrv9VTpmF

Earlier today I had the honor of joining @GovMurphy and @RepAndyKimNJ  in announcing the distribution of $60M in relief funding for municipalities and counties hit hardest from the #COVID19 pandemic.   https://t.co/UtH7KyemSZ

Proud to receive the endorsement of the Health Professionals & Allied Employees union for the general election.  In the age of #Covid and beyond we need to continue to fight for the best interests of our #healthcare workers and I intend to continue that fight. https://t.co/EV63BYHyOJ

Centers like @CAMcareWeCare and @ProjHOPECamden provide high-quality health care for our #SouthJersey residents who are most in need.   #COVID19 has demonstrated the importance of health care centers in providing accessible services to at-risk residents.  https://t.co/bvf5teC4UQ

Due to the growing #Veteran suicide epidemic my colleagues and I on the Veterans Affairs Committee are working to increase veterans’ access to virtual mental healthcare - a necessary service in the age of COVID & social distancing #SuicidePreventionMonth  https://t.co/uNwnUkqRZ6

#LaborDay traditionally marks the end of summer and the start of a new school year.  This year as communities across the country continue to grapple with the #COVID19 pandemic and the global recession Labor Day will be unlike any in our lifetimes.   https://t.co/QX8p9ppvHt

.@FiveThirtyEight has provided a state-by-state interactive guide to voting in the age of #COVID19.   Because of the pandemic #NewJersey is automatically mailing ballots to all voters. Make sure you are registered!  #Vote2020 #RegisterToVote   https://t.co/alrJlC75bN

Wearing a mask is a scientifically proven way to help stop the spread of #COVID19.  My colleagues and I #MaskUp to ensure that our communities are safe for everyone! #MaskUpNewJersey https://t.co/yFhfU5Q4NH

Our country must have a comprehensive strategy to not only defeat #COVID19 but address the economic crisis and growing racial disparities. @JoeBiden has a plan to do it.  Here is my op-ed in support for Joe Biden's #BuildBackBetterPlan    https://t.co/XikpF3hMcD

.@FiveThirtyEight has provided a state-by-state interactive guide to voting in the age of #COVID19.   Because of the pandemic #NewJersey is automatically mailing ballots to all voters. Make sure you are registered!   https://t.co/alrJlC75bN

My admiration for educators and their essential role in our society was amplified greatly as we witnessed the dedication and resiliency of NJ’s teachers during #COVID__19  For that reason and many others I am honored to have @NJEA’s endorsement. https://t.co/6LxyPrykbG

Countries around the world figured out how to defeat the #coronavirus. Our country without proper leadership from the President is still suffering.   It’s time we put a real leader in the White House. @JoeBiden #TeamBiden https://t.co/gPplcYh5rM

This critical federal funding will help Camden County cover the unexpected costs of the #coronavirus pandemic including testing and keeping our first responders and other essential workers safe and on the job.   https://t.co/uQGpYPleu7
We need a President that will listen to medical experts - we need @JoeBiden in the White House. #COVID19 #TeamBiden https://t.co/FARNcNuYOe

I am proud to have the endorsement of the Health Professionals & Allied Employees union.  In the age of #Covid and beyond  we need to continue to fight for the best interests of our #healthcare workers and I intend to continue that fight.   https://t.co/lwcW8NBvUs https://t.co/E9t00suHDS

#COVID has highlighted the need for skilled workers. This federal grant funding will ensure that Registered Apprenticeship Programs are equipped with the resources to address the nation’s challenges and continue training NJ’s highly skilled workforce.  https://t.co/pxeeEsL6YS

It would be cruel to allow unemployment benefits to expire while so many Americans are hurting financially due to #COVID19.   It's time for the Senate Republicans and President Trump to take action & extend the federal unemployment benefits.  https://t.co/UioPM4CPBf

The fight against #COVID19 is not over!   Wash your hands Wear a mask Practice Social Distancing  Get tested  Protect your loved ones. Protect your community. Protect each other.  #MaskUp #coronavirus   https://t.co/sxmmKRo0gp
By providing thousands of masks for local residents the @CooperFdn Norcross Foundation and the @CamdenCountyPD will help stop the spread of #COVID19 in South Jersey #MaskUpNJ  https://t.co/d34qpUngXS

Every American from essential workers to families and from small business owners to students urgently needs help to weather the health crisis and economic crisis caused by #COVID19. #HeroesAct  https://t.co/nr3Jm4I2cf

While we're facing the #coronavirus crisis protecting the public health of our community is more important than ever and this federal funding will provide a safer environment for Camden residents.   https://t.co/wQ8Ut12wKW

The global generosity group responsible for the annual #GivingTuesday in November announced #GivingTuesdayNow a global day of giving and unity set to take place on May 5 2020 as an emergency response to the unprecedented need caused by #COVID19.  https://t.co/FEKzfsr5Z7 https://t.co/w5bExh18Ys

Today is #WorkersMemorialDay which honors all workers who have lost their life on the job.   This year we add the healthcare workers first responders and essential workers we lost in the fight against #COVID19 in our memories and thoughts. https://t.co/Xo6SzmGjqQ

Proud to share this @NBCPhiladelphia segment on the great work being done at my alma mater Pennsauken High!   Using 3D printing technology the school is working around the clock to mass produce masks for our healthcare workers fighting #Covid19  https://t.co/ap1p6aBLRw

To fight #COVID19 we must first understand it. The work being done at @Rutgers_Camden will advance our knowledge of how the coronavirus infects patients and how the disease spreads — information we desperately need. https://t.co/Nc3SbAtZAR

The Research Director at @NJPolicy cites the Working Families Tax Relief Act as a way to help economically vulnerable Americans hit hardest from the #COVID19 pandemic   I proudly co-sponsored this bill because NJ working families deserve tax relief!  https://t.co/BppOjoKXhN

The impact #COVID19 has on daily routines may cause unanticipated stress on some veterans in crisis.  For veterans in crisis help is available: ☎️Call the Veteran Crisis Line: 1 (800) 273-8255 & press 1 💻Visit: https://t.co/OOHQ8kxkAm  📱Text: 838255

The #COVID19 outbreak could endanger our state blood supply at this crucial time.   Now more than ever we need healthy members of our community to step up to the plate and help with this cause.    Schedule an appointment:  https://t.co/wmKZHBCtGt  #DonateBlood https://t.co/r8IKs2Ehcf

This #NationalDoctorsDay brings us a greater appreciation than ever before for the #healthcare professionals on the front lines saving lives and creating a healthier world.  Thank you to the nurses physicians and all healthcare providers for the tireless fight against #COVID19 https://t.co/WSzay0P6lt

NJ residents with questions concerns or to stay up-to-date on #COVID19 there are resources available:  💻Visit the New Jersey COVID-19 Information Hub ➡️ https://t.co/bJ37OcvgA7 ☎️Call 2-1-1 📱Text NJCOVID to 898-211 to receive text information & stay informed

Thank you to the #healthcare providers nurses doctors janitorial staff and individuals working around the clock to ensure the health & safety of our community as we navigate through these difficult times. #COVID19 #Coronavirus https://t.co/VW0yDlNm0r
